channel.title: [REQ] Looking for best beginner artist for a challenge or anyone please!
channel.description:
[size=35pt]Get your post reserved today and show me what you got against others![/size] NOTE: I'm not sure if this is allowed, but I do know this belongs in here for pictures.
[u][b]Introduction[/b][/u] I'm only saying this to see what all I can do with my art, I want to make somethen out of this for fun and also improve my ability in art. I'm willing to prove to myself that I am in great quality of a competitive artist with these people who think they got what it takes to be a great artist on these forums(anywhere really). Show out your work and give me the best you've got, I dont want any picture that you say you've played around with. I just wanna see what I can do with this, because I'm in 8th grade going to 9th and I want to be much better when I get in 9th. So what ever you make is your best on this post: [hr]
[u][b]-==Rules==-[/b][/u] [b]1. No leeching off of pictures are just cutting out them -[/b] [i]This means you need to come up with your own ideas instead of cutting out a picture(Picture gotta be made from scratch only!).[/i] [b]2. Name must be wrote'n at the bottom or top -[/b][i] Not in the middle or side middle, but not to big please.[/i] [b]3. Reserve your post and I'll give link to page that your reserved post is on - [/b][i]This is so you dont have to get your pictures lost.[/i] [b][/b][i][/i] [hr]
Names are listed in order! Dont get mad if your not above them, this is to keep track in case of someone signing up again. [u][b]-==Contestants==-[/b][/u] Greek Line [hr] -==Reserved Post Location of Contestants==- Page #1 Greek Line

item.title: [REQ] Looking for best beginner artist for a challenge or anyone please!
item.dc:creator: @Greek_Line Greek Line
item.description:
@Greek_Line wrote:

[size=35pt]Get your post reserved today and show me what you got against others![/size]
NOTE: I’m not sure if this is allowed, but I do know this belongs in here for pictures.

Introduction
I’m only saying this to see what all I can do with my art, I want to make somethen out of this for fun and also improve my ability in art. I’m willing to prove to myself that I am in great quality of a competitive artist with these people who think they got what it takes to be a great artist on these forums(anywhere really). Show out your work and give me the best you’ve got, I dont want any picture that you say you’ve played around with. I just wanna see what I can do with this, because I’m in 8th grade going to 9th and I want to be much better when I get in 9th. So what ever you make is your best on this post:
[hr]

-==Rules==-
1. No leeching off of pictures are just cutting out them - This means you need to come up with your own ideas instead of cutting out a picture(Picture gotta be made from scratch only!).
2. Name must be wrote’n at the bottom or top - Not in the middle or side middle, but not to big please.
3. Reserve your post and I’ll give link to page that your reserved post is on - This is so you dont have to get your pictures lost.

[hr]

Names are listed in order! Dont get mad if your not above them, this is to keep track in case of someone signing up again.
-==Contestants==-
Greek Line
[hr]
-==Reserved Post Location of Contestants==-
Page #1
Greek Line

Read full topic
